title: WorkMate is Virtual Assistant (VA) Management System
about: WorkMate is a VA management system, where a busy person can hire and manage the activity of Virtual Assistant. We provide an experienced team of Virtual Assistant (VA) in a diversified domains of experties. The proliferation of work-load, expansion of Information Technology, and sophistication of Artificial Intelligence require appropriate person to assist in business. However, managing VA is a formidable task. WorkMate promises to make this task easy for you to support your business to grow
subscription: Empower yourself with knowledge and nurture your mind and soul with our virtual assistant blog subscription. Proliferate your business with appropriate action.

head-carousel.title: Let your VA handle it.
head-carousel.sub-title: To-do list growing out of control?
head-carousel.subsub-title: Your time is valuable. Let our VAs to take the mountain of routine tasks off your hands.

head-carousel.title: How Our VA helps Your Business
head-carousel.sub-title: Web Development, Creative Content, and Digital Marketing
head-carousel.subsub-title: We offer full-time and part-time assistants in web development, web maintenance, creating creative content, digital marketing, customer support and operations. We can help you hire just one assistant, or an end-to-end team that takes over an entire department or business function.

head-carousel.title: Try a VA for free
head-carousel.sub-title: Want to know how it fits?
head-carousel.subsub-title: Just send us your first task and one of our virtual assistants will do it for free.

head-carousel.title: VA for Startups & Enterprise
head-carousel.sub-title: From skilled worker to AI-specialized assistant
head-carousel.subsub-title: Delegate your work, tasks & processes to a dedicated, full-time team member. You may also hire a part-time assistant to grow.

appointment.title: Get Doctor's Appointment
appointment.sub-title: Your Gateway to Hassle-Free Medical Consultations
appointment.description: Your convenient solution for scheduling doctor's appointments from the comfort of your own home. Our user-friendly platform lets you schedule appointments instantly, 24/7.

service.title: Services
service.sub-title: Choose the best medical services and experience a new standard of care.
service.description: Our innovation connect you to expert doctors, trained care-providers, pharmacies for online medicine order, and blog for health updates. Join today!

list.title: Doctor's Appointment
list.short-description: Patient can classify which specialist does he to see using AI and can get doctor's appointment using web, phone-call or SMS easily and quickly staying at home.

list.title: Prescription
list.short-description: We aim to establish our online prescription system for hassle-free prescription. Doctor can create it easily, quickly, and efficiently. Patient can share to other as necessary.

list.title: Home Services (Care-giver)
list.short-description: Are you looking for skilled nurses to care for your family’s baby/elderly parents or sick loved ones? Now to get nursing services at home, we are at your side.

list.title: Online Medicine Order
list.short-description: We provide medicines through a medical prescription and healthcare products to be dispensed at pick-up and home delivery in all over Bangladesh.

list.title: Doctors' Blog
list.short-description: Doctors blog to educate patients, to humanize themselves, to improve current patient adherence, and to keep people up to date with the latest medical research.

list.title: Medicine Branding
list.short-description: Medicine branding increases online visibility, controls professional reputation, and establishes your ‘niche’ market. Get online, be active to ensure pay-off.

home-service.title: Home Services
home-service.sub-title: You can enjoy peace of mind knowing that our caregivers are there for you, providing round-the-clock assistance whenever and wherever you need it.
home-service.description: We understand the importance of maintaining independence and quality of life in the comfort of your own home. Our team of compassionate caregivers is dedicated to providing personalized care tailored to your unique needs. We believe that true care goes beyond just tending to physical needs. We provide emotional support and companionship, fostering a genuine connection with our clients.

list.title: Post-Stroke Physiotherapy
list.short-description: Our expert help the patients to regain strength, coordination and functionto improve his posture and balance.

list.title: Rehabilitation at Home
list.short-description: We offer home occupational therapy, respite care services, and flexible home care options to cater to the diverse needs of our clients.

list.title: Babysitting and Elderly Care
list.short-description: We offers the best babysitting and elderly care services to ensure peace of mind for parents through carefully selecting experienced, well-trained, and passionate care-givers.

list.title: In-home Nursing Assistance
list.short-description: We offer a range of in-home nursing services cater to various needs, from geriatric care to post-surgery home care and palliative care services.

list.title: Midwifery at Home
list.short-description: A skilled, knowledgeable and compassionate care-giver will take care of pregnants and newborn infants.

list.title: Beauty Treatments at Home
list.short-description: Our professional artists provide premium facial, meni-pedi treatments that will leave you feeling rejuvenated and refreshed.
